long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Blur is a chrome extension and firefox addon that blurs out potential spoiler information from IMDB. With Blur installed, upon loading any page on IMDB, Blur will hide any information relating to an actor's amount of time on a show, or how many episodes they participated in.

Any information that you wish to be unblurred can be hovered over with the mouse! It's that easy!
